com.characterforming.jrte

Interface ITarget

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITransduction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTarget

    public interface ITarget
    Interface for transduction target classes, which express IEffector instances that are invoked from runtime transductions. Target implementations must subclass and extend BaseTarget with specialized effectors.

    Target classes must present a public default constructor with no arguments. A proxy instance of the target implementation class is instantiated during gearbox compilation to determine the names and types of the target effectors.

    The bind(ITransduction) method will be called on the proxy target at the end of the gearbox compilation process to verify effector binding and effector parameter compilation. At that time the IParameterizedEffector.newParameters(int) and IParameterizedEffector.setParameter(int, byte[][]) methods will be called for each IParameterizedEffector.

    At runtime, targets are bound only once to a transduction and the binding persists for the lifetime of the target object. Applications use the transduction to start and restart transducers and run them against available inputs. The target effectors update the target state when the transduction is run.

    Author:
    kb

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the target as referenced in transducers that use the target.
        Returns:
        The name of of this target

      • bind

        IEffector<?>[] bind(ITransduction transduction)
             throws TargetBindingException
        Bind a transduction and list all effectors presented by this target. This method is called to list the names and types of the effectors expressed by the target class and to bind the target effectors and effector parameters to the transduction.

        Subclasses must include their effectors in the IEffector array returned. After runtime binding, effectors are invoked when triggered by input transitions.

        Parameters:
        transduction - The Transduction that the target is being bound to
        Returns:
        An array of IEffector instances implemented by the target.
        Throws:
        TargetBindingException - On error
        See Also:
        BaseTarget.bind(ITransduction)

      • getTransduction

        ITransduction getTransduction()
        Get the ITransduction instance that is bound to the target
        Returns:
        The Transduction that is bound to the target, or null if unbound
